remarks: The double converse of a class is a function iff the class is single-valued.  Each side is equivalent to Definition 6.4(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23, who use the notation "Un(A)" for single-valued. Note that ` A ` is not necessarily a function.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2004.)
statement:
fun2cnv $p |- ( Fun `' `' A <-> A. x E* y x A y ) $.
$d A x y $.
